1.content:
Right, first things first, we must establish what you want to see.


In the body expansion area, you'll find inflation(with different methods), pregnancy(once again, different methods), muscle gain(not a fan, but oh well, different methods), and the good ol' staple of weight gain(And you guessed it, different methods).

In the body-part expansion area, you'll find Breast expansion, butt expansion, and belly expansion(it counts as a body part).

In the size/time altering area, you'll find shrinking, giantess-growth, age progression, and age regression.

In the double-header area, you'll find dual-transformations, and you can add your own combinations.

And finally, in the odds and ends area, you can add in whatever the hell you want.
Enjoy.
1.title: Every story needs a beginning!

11.content: Same as before, but with actual purpose!
11.title: Body expansion

111.content:
There's only two inflation based things that I know of, gas and liquids.




Not that kind of gas, I meant air, helium, and carbon dioxide(though, that isn't really healthy...)
111.title: Bicycle pumps available on request

1111.content:
Now you have a few choices here.


First up is harmless oxygen, also known as Air.
It just makes things rounder, and doesn't cause them to fly off.

Next is Helium, which has the delightful effect of causing things to fly off.
Do not use outdoors without a secure tether-line.

Finally is Carbon monoxide.
With this one will need some biologically changing chemicals, or some form of magic or something...
Yeah, I'll let you figure it out.

First off is an alien based plot line, where they have this weird ray-gun thing that causes people to become pregnant with their alien seed.


And the second plot is based on basic biology.

11211.content:
"Man... that was one royally screwed up dream I had last night..." Katharine muttered, rubbing the sleep from her eyes as she pulled the covers off of herself.
"I can't believe that alien stuck a prob there..." she continued, as she slowly made her way to the bathroom to brush her teeth, but she stopped at the full length mirror her mother had had in the bathroom since she was a tiny kitten, she had never really bother to understood why her mother had put in, but she didn't care, because it was an easy way to make sure that she was ready for the day.
As she stared at her reflection, she saw something that was out of the ordinary, she swiftly took another glance at her reflection, only to see that...
11211.title: Waking up, with a massive headache

112111.content:
She couldn't believe it, her belly was rounded out, looking as though she'd had a huge meal. She touched her belly carefully, tentatively. It was firm, tight. With a start she realized that she looked about 5 months pregnant. Her hands bumped into her bosom as she fully realized how big they'd grown too -- at least D-cups, and overnight. Katherine's nipples were thicker and darker, and seemed to be aching.

She shakes her head, thinking she must be crazy, and takes a long shower, massaging the water into her own body. After she dries off, she puts on soft silk sleeping pants and shirt that have always been loose on her. The waistband is fairly snug, and holding her pants up as she finds herself starting to feel tired once more. Without thinking too closely about it, she crawls into bed and falls asleep once more.

The next morning, she discovers ...
112111.title: Her belly and breasts had grown larger over night

choices: Her breasts were bigger still, and growing!
112112.content:
Katherine has been a 34B cup for almost a year, but she was bigger now ... her breasts were puffier somehow. Swollen. If she had to guess, she'd think maybe a full C-cup or a little bigger. Her nipples were also very dark, standing out in sharp contrast to her pale skin.

"That's so odd ... what did those aliens do to me?" She tentatively strokes her breasts, softly at first, and goes weak in the knees as she realizes how overly sensitive they are. "Omigod... that's new ..."

She decides that a shower is in order, and lets the warm water cascade over her as she finds herself still rubbing her breasts, pulling at them gently. One hand keeps going toward her nice flat tummy. It's then that she finds something else odd happening...
112112.title: Her stomach was flat, but her breasts were slig...

113.content:
Okay, there are two speeds to weight gain.
First up is the traditional slow manner, which is my personal favorite because it will leave you wanting more, thus causing more of a draw to people.


Or the horribly cheap eat a hamburger and gain two-hundred pounds.
Or as I like to call it "Lulz she so fat!" method.
113.title: All you can gorge buffet time!

choices: Eating sensible food makes for a sensable young lady
Nothing like a good ol' all-you-can-eat buffet binge
1131.content:
During the year of Katherine's eighteenth summer, her parents have gone off on a luxury cruise in the Caribbean islands. Katherine opted to stay behind, because she had never been one to enjoy the overly-excessive heat of the Caribbean sea. Now, her parents are not the kind to spend money frivolously, but they haven't gone on a vacation since Katherine was born, so they decided to splurge a little.
"I can't believe they went off on a vacation, and didn't leave any food in the fridge for me" Katherine muttered, as she looked through her family's pantry, seeing it bare except for some cleaning supplies, a old unused fondue set, and for some reason a monkey's skeleton. "Why do we have a monkey skeleton, yet we don't have flour, sugar, salt, or heck, even Bisquick..." she sighed, walking out of the pantry to the kitchen "Not even a drop of milk, slice of bread, or potted meat, looks like I'll have to use that debit card pops left behind" she stated, picking up the small plastic card from her father's "secret" hiding spot behind the coffee pot.


~Intermission~
What should she do with the credit card?
1 - Go out and purchase enough food to fill the pantry and the fridge.
2 - Get enough food to stock the entire house and then some, then throw a big party for all of her friends from school
3 - Eat at an all-you-can-eat buffet, and worry about supplies after eating.
1131.title: Slow paced

choices: Katherine heads down to the store to buy the groceries...
Katherine changes her mind and the list so she can test those cooking classes
11311.content:
Katherine quickly gets to work, grabbing a notebook and pen from the junk drawer and planning out a list of groceries for the week.

Dairy: Skim milk, yogurt, egg substitute...
Meat: extra-lean chicken, tuna packed in water...
Fruit and Vegetables: Broccoli, Lettuce, celery, carrots, fruit juice...
Grains: cereal, multigrain bread, whole-wheat pasta...

Having completed a well thought out diet for the week, Katherine pockets the list and grabs her coat, getting ready for the trip to the store.
11311.title: Sensible plans

choices: The low-fat foods on her list are completley sold out!
There's a brand-new health-foods section (they had to put the evil somewhere...)
113111.content:
Katherine's bus screeches to a halt in front of their local supermarket: Flor-Mart,
filled with low-prices, friendly personnel, and a little bit of evil...

While walking down the aisles, Katherine notices something odd...
113111.title: Down by the supermarket

choices: before she could pay and leave, someone stops her
She gets home, but something's not right...
1131111.content:
"Darn!" exclaimed Katherine, "I shouldn't have put this off so long, Flor-Mart is the last place open at this time of night, and I'm starving!".
Having decided to settle for what they have, using her list as a general guideline, she gets back to her shopping, filling her cart with what she could find...
1131111.title: The low-fat foods on her list are completley so...

choices: Someone enters the house while she's asleep!?
11311112.content:
With the bags containing less than healthy foods over her arms, as she arrives at the front steps to her house, Katherine notices a large stack of brown boxes next to the door.
Checking the boxes, they are full of food!
She couldn't believe that her parents didn't leave any food for her, which was accurate, her parents had sent for a catering service to supply their dear daughter with food!
"...they really should have said something..." said Katherine as she packed the groceries she and her parents had bought into the fridge and pantry.
Frozen pizzas, pies, ice cream, chips, one box even contained a complete, cooked thanksgiving feast!

Katherine was exhausted and starving after a long day, and it would be a shame to let that freshly cooked turkey to go to waste...

She loaded a plate up with a drumstick, stuffing, mashed potatoes, gravy, half a turkey breast, and the DVD player with her favorite movie.
The previews barely finished the same time as she had finished off her plate, "I must have been hungrier than I thought" thought Katherine as she filled up her second plate...

When the credits were rolling by, she decided to take a minute to put the leftovers away, and a minute was all it took, there was nothing left but bones!
Well, bones and a whole apple pie...
...and there was still the sequel to her movie to watch...
She had been reluctant to touch sweets before, she was more concerned with maintaining her body, but it just looked so...

Yawning, Katherine trudged her way up the stairs, with her taught, warm belly poking out as the result of her "stuffing", she flopped down on her bed, purring as she drifts off to sleep.
11311112.title: Way too much food!

choices: Time to go outside and work that belly off!
Then again, she is still kind of hungry...
113111121.content:
About 2 a.m., when Katherine was in one of the deepest cycles of sleep, she got up and started to lurch down the stairs. But her eyes were blank; she was sleep-walking! And oddly enough, she was heading towards the kitchen.

Whereas her mind was gone in sleep, her body took over and her sense of smell lead her to what she didn't finish before; That delicious apple pie. Her body didn't even hesitate at all, one hand grabbing a section of the pie and bringing it to her mouth, moaning with pleasure. In just a few minutes, the entire pie was devoured, leaving just a thin tin plate left.

Of course, what's pie without whipped cream? Well, that's the logic her body decided to follow, because soon she was guzzling down two cans straight into her mouth! When those were cashed, she was in the mood for ice cream, only this time she felt like actually using a spoon. After all, ice cream tends to be cold. Bit by bit, Katherine dug into carton, until she started to scrap at the bottom...and sides....and anywhere else that had no more ice cream. Her stomach started to growl at her. If that meant to stop eating or not, the dozing Katherine read that as to eat more. So she was eating a bag of potato chips...then munched on another.

All that eating left her thirsty, so she opened the refrigerator door and grabbed the largest carton of milk and started chugging away. Even when asleep, she took her time, barely getting a drop or two on her chin.

Finally, after all that, she had enough and slid down against the wall, purring back into a restful sleep.

Katherine slowly woke up at about 9 a.m. The first thing she noticed was she was no longer on her own bed. The second thing she noticed was the large belly, for some reason, it was larger and felt tighter than it did before she went to bed.

She struggled to get off her back and checked all the locks in the house. Everything was secure. It was by then that Katherine realized that she must have been...sleep-eating! She never heard of anyone doing that but that couldn't be a good sign. She held her belly with both hands and gently shook it, feeling all the food she consumed last night slosh around. Blushing at her unintended feast, she knew she had to do something....then again, it was morning and time for breakfast...
113111121.title: Katherine starts sleep-eating!?

choices: To heck with it, she digs into to the cheese puffs!
No! She could hardly do a short jog! No more junk food!
1131111211.content:
Katherine's hands were still on her bloated mid section as she absentminded rubbed it gently to ease the tight feeling. She made it back to her room where she stood in front of her closet and dug out her old sweat suit. She quickly removed her PJ's and started getting ready for a jog around the block. Her sweat suit felt a little tight around her belly but she did her best to ignore it.

Katherine waddled downstairs she plopped down on the bottom step and with a bit of effort got her sneakers on. She pulled herself to her feet and took a deep breath as she opened the door. She peeked outside to see if her neighbors were up yet, much to her relief it appeared as though no one was around. She locked the door discretely and sighed as she stretched her body before her run. She took another survey of the area and started her run. With each step she could feel her belly bounce the food inside sloshing around mercilessly in a attempt to get her to stop.

Her face was turning beet red as she ran. She kept running as hard as she could her face becoming covered in sweat. After she felt like she ran a good distance she stopped and jogged in place to see how far she went. She looked at the nearest intersection and was shocked at what she saw. She then turned around and saw her house was still within eye shot! She couldn't believe it, she felt like she ran 10 miles but has hardly gone down the street!

Disheartened, she sighed and headed back. She stumbled inside panting heavily her full belly expanding and contracting greatly with each breath. She looked at the hall clock and saw she ran for a whole 10 minutes. Covered in sweat she climbed the stairs to her bathroom and peeled off her sweat covered jogging suit. She tossed it in the hamper and as she started to get in the shower she saw he reflection. She looked at herself pleased somewhat by what she saw. Her belly was tight and round it really showed off her curves... She shrugged and hopped into the shower cleaning herself back to her normal well kept self.

She stepped out of the steamy bathroom and into her room and dressed herself into a loose t-shirt and her favorite blue skirt. She gracefully stepped downstairs refreshed and plopped down on the couch. She turned on the TV and started to zone out when her belly started to rumble. She placed her hand under her shirt and rubbed her belly as a gnawing hunger filler her stomach. She looked around and saw a bag of cheese poofs on the other side of the couch. She licked her lips and thought about it for a moment...
1131111211.title: Time to go outside and work that belly off!

1131111212.content:
"Just a little bite, I can't exercise on an empty stomach" Katherine mumbled to her self.

She went to the pantry to see what she still had... bacon, eggs, sausage, pancakes were the first things she laid her eyes on. she threw on six pieces of bacon, three eggs, five sausage patties and five pancakes. "I'll just reheat the leftovers for lunch" she told herself.

While the food was cooking, Katherine went upstairs to change into some loose clothes to exercise in. As she took off her clothes, she saw herself in her bedroom mirror, and was taken aback. Last night's feasting had left its mark on her body. Her slender 34B-25-34 frame was still pretty good looking, but her belly surprised her. She went into the bathroom and weighed herself. 121 pounds, 6 heavier than earlier. Shrugging, she realized she was gonna have to work out hard today. She slipped on her favorite pair of baggy sweats, realizing the waistband was a little snug.

Katherine went downstairs to eat her breakfast. She started on the bacon, and was amazed at how good it tasted. I'll just finish it off, she thought, and that she did. Her eyes then turned on the sausage and eggs. After several minutes of mindless eating, Katherine realized she had finished off both the eggs and sausage. "wow" she chuckled to herself, "maybe I'll save the pancakes for later". As she got up to leave though, the tantalizing aroma of the pancakes caught her attention. "Just one". Whipping out the butter and plenty of syrup, Katherine lit into the pancakes. "Oh my god, they're so delicious" she thought and in no time all five pancakes were gone.

Looking down, she realized that her pants were quite tight. She lifted up her sweatshirt to take in her swollen belly, which was now quite prominent. "I've gotta do something about this" she thought and went outside, struggling with her swollen belly and tight waistband. She started off with a little jog. She planned to run about two miles, but less than a third of a mile into the run, she had to stop. Panting heavily she decided that maybe she should just do some sit-ups and push-ups. She got on her back, planning to do a good set of sit-ups before realizing that her swollen belly had other plans, She struggled mightily, and managed to get partially up several times, but her midsection kept getting in the way. The once comfortably snug sweats were now stretched tightly across her swollen stomach.

"Maybe I'll wait for the food to wear off..." she thought, and went inside. She had been exercising for 18 minutes.
1131111212.title: Then again, she is still kind of hungry...

choices: She takes off the tight clothes and switches into some "looser" clothing
Goes out, showing off her new curves
11311112121.content:
Realizing that it was 11:30, Katherine felt a slight tinge in my stomach. "Tough workout, I'm starving" she thought. She made herself two sandwiches and grabbed an economy sized bag of chips, and sat down on the couch in front of the TV. Within no time the food was gone and it was time for desert. She got a pint of Ben and Jerry's ice cream, her favorite, Rocky Road. She wolfed it down, and drifted off to sleep to the tune of five chocolate chip cookies.

Waking up, she realized the extent of the day's feasting. Her stomach was in pain, and had bloated to the size of a three-month pregnant woman. Four hours of sleeping had allowed the food to settle a bit, her stomach wasn't quite as tight, but she realized how soft it had gotten compared to that morning. She struggled to get up, and went upstairs to change into some more comfortable clothes. As she searched through her dresser, her cell phone rang. It was her friend Megan, who wanted to know if she felt like going out that night. Katherine had been wondering what she was gonna do, and decided a night out would be better than being locked in the house with the seemingly unlimited food supplies. She got a short skirt and a snug sweater out of her dresser. Stripping down, she realized that her sweats her a LOT tighter in the bottom. Her underwear had also gotten a lot tighter. She pulled her skirt up over her thicker thighs. It was her favorite skirt, and has always been a little bit tight, she got it back when she was a 105 pound 16 year old girl. However, right away she realized something was wrong.
After five minutes of struggling, she finally managed to fasten her skirt, as she looked into the mirror she noticed that she had slight love handles forming over the sides of her skirt, not to mention her belly was pushing against the front of it. Further down, she noted that her hips were sticking out, and below the hemline she could see that she had thicker thighs.
"I better step up my exercise plan in the morning... I'm starting to get warning signs of thunder thighs" she muttered, scrutinizing her figure, before putting on her sweater "Oh well, maybe if I wear thigh-high socks no one will notice my thicker thighs" she said, opening her dresser drawer to pull out a pair of black thigh-high socks.

Her new curves were packed into her skirt, and she had love handles oozing out of the waistband. She was now 126 pounds, 11 heavier than yesterday afternoon. The seams of the skirt appeared about to burst, and her once snug sweater now dug into her stomach, clearly outlining the results of the day's feasting.
11311112121.title: Time for lunch!

choices: She couldn't control her own appetite
She tries to keep a check on her appetite
113111121211.content:
"Ugh. Until I lose some weight, this just isn't going to work."

Katherine spent two frustrating minutes getting out of her skirt and then casually threw off her sweater. Thinking for a bit, people really don't dress up much anymore, so maybe some casual clothes would hide her figure and fit better too? Digging around, Katherine found some loose sweat pants and a matching hoodie. Not very dressy but it'll have to do. Pleased at her "body camouflage", she called up Megan and confirm their plans.

"I've heard good things about this movie and thought we could catch it together." Megan explained.

"Yeah, that sounds great. The usual spot then?" Katherine inquired.

"Sure, but I'm getting kind of hungry, so how about we try this new place? I've been there before, but I'm not sure you have."

That comment made Katherine froze for a bit. The last thing she needed was more food, but then again, eating one meal would be better than the alternative of staying with a house full of fatty foods.

"S-sure. That sounds great. I'll see you there."

It didn't take long for Katherine to meet up with Megan. Even though they've been friends since kindergarten, meeting up for fun was strange for Katherine lately since Megan was always six inches taller than her since high school. Still, a simple meal and a movie sounded like a good plan. Hopefully, she'll be too tired after the movie to even think about late night snacks. Of course, if she started to sleep eat again...

"Hey, Kat. Dressing down today?"

"Uh, yeah, I mean, who dresses up anymore, right?" Katherine hoped that Megan wouldn't notice anything.

"Eh, don't worry about it. That movie theater is always so chilly. And I've seen people wear worst at the restaurant. You're just gonna love it!"

So for about ten minutes the two talked about the usual: homework and school, guys, the latest gossip. Katherine was so engrossed in talking that she didn't notice which restaurant they were going until she stepped inside.

That's when Katherine froze up. Apparently, this new restaurant was one of those all-you-can-eat Chinese buffets. It didn't help that Katherine always had a keen sense of smell. The sweet and sour chicken, the stir fried rice, Mongolian beef, chicken, and shrimp, Kung Pao chicken and shrimp and pork. The smells of everything was tempting her, almost driving her wild. But this wasn't any good. In fact, this was very bad! Ever since her parents left, Katherine started having trouble controlling her eating and this was just making things worse. But there was no way she could back out without hurting Megan's feelings or telling her about the weight she just gained.

Katherine tried to keep her cool and after grabbing her plate, she...
113111121211.title: She takes off the tight clothes and switches in...

11311112122.content:
Katerine decided that there was no way she could work out with a full stomach after all, and she was feeling kind of sleepy....

"I'll just...continue after I lie down for a bit." she yawned as she plopped on the couch and drifted off to sleep.

Katerine managed to wake up a little past 12 noon, relieved that she didn't sleep ate again. But as soon as she sat up, her stomach started to growl again.

"I really need to work this belly off...but I'm so hungry...."

She decided to...
11311112122.title: Cat Nap

choices: Went outside to catch her breath
11312.content:
Katherine needed to buy more groceries, of course. But who said she couldn't buy more than just the normal list? In fact, her parents were going to be gone for quite awhile, so why not have a party or two? After all, she can just clean up afterward. And they did kind of deserve it for leaving her alone with no food for herself.

And so Katherine decided to "borrow" the family SUV and drive down to the local supermarket, the one with the lobster tank and the smoothie bar. You know the one. After gathering all the normal groceries that no home should be without, Katherine got to the fun part; party food. Wanting to throw the best party this side of town, she went all out; cake mixes, pizzas, soda, snacks, the works.

After arriving home and struggling to find room for everything, Katherine called up all her friends; no reason to invite the entire school, right? However, every person she called wanted to invite someone else....and Katherine would felt bad if she said no.

Perhaps she should have been more assertive. What was supposed to be just about 12 or so people turned into 73 party house. The upside was that everyone brought in something in addition to her own little spread but this wasn't what she wanted. Katherine started to feel a little sad and reacted by...
11312.title: Large Party Tonight at Kat's!

choices: The good tasting but filling Italian food
Start off with an appetizer, maybe the salad bar?
11313.content:
Katherine decided to splurge. It was her father's credit card after all.

"Now where should I go?" Picking up a phone book she looked under buffets. Many places were good but she wanted the best of the best. Finally one appeared that would seem to sate her need.

Le Gourmand, even the name seemed sophisticated to Kat. Looking up the address she then decided to invite one of her friends over, Lucinda, a bunny girl with a hunger for sweets that knew no end. Katherine then called her up.

"Sure Kat, I'd love to go. I'll meet there okay?"

"Fine, see you there and bring your appetite!" Hanging up, Kat then went to her car and drove to her buffet. It looked very expensive but she had her dad's money so that didn't worry her. Meeting Lucinda in the lobby, both of the young women's tummies rumbled at the thought of all that delicious food they would soon be having. What food do they want to eat?
11313.title: Nothing like a good ol' all-you-can-eat buf...

choices: Live a little and stuff herself with desserts
Call it quits. She still needs to do some shopping
113131.content:
The two girls paid for their meals before heading into the dining area. Kat was starving, and from the way Lucinda was eyeing the salad bar, she wasn't the only one. She hadn't had anything all day since her parents hadn't left any food, so she figured it would be fine to load up here. Besides, with how expensive it was, she wanted to get her money's worth out of it.

Katherine closed her eyes, savoring the smells that surrounded her as she imagined all the food she was going to eat. She loved eating, but didn't really get much of a chance to enjoy herself with her parents around. It seemed like they hardly ever kept the pantry or cupboards stocked up. Thus the situation she was in today.

Lucinda gave a little hop beside her, "It all looks soooo good, but I think I'm going to start with a salad."

"Sounds good. I'm going to hit up the pasta over there that's calling my name." Kat replied to Lucinda's back as she practically hopped away.

Kat chuckled as she watched her lithe friend begin loading up a bowl with some lettuce. She made her way towards the Italian food, grabbing a large plate and loading it up with a couple pounds of pasta. She was so hungry, and she loved pasta. And how could she have pasta without garlic bread, she thought as she grabbed a full loaf and began nibbling on it as she made her way towards her table.

Lucinda was already seated and shoveling her salad into her mouth. Though, Kat was finding it hard to call it a salad. It more looked like a bowl of dressing with some lettuce thrown in for good measure. Still, it wasn't like she could judge with how many carbs she had on her plate.

The two girls talked about what they were going to do over the summer break while they ate their food ravenously. Kat couldn't help herself from going back for another plate of the delicious food. Then a third. Then a fourth. It just felt good to let loose for once. Besides, it wasn't like she'd had anything else to eat today. Though she was probably pushing 10000 Calories from this meal alone.

The two girls leaned back in their chairs. Lucinda licked a smidgen of dressing off of her lips and gave a little hic, while Kat rubbed her bulging belly. She couldn't believe how much she'd eaten, but it felt so good to be this full. She'd eaten so much food already, but she found her eyes wandering towards the dessert table loaded with cookies and cakes, brownies and fudge. It all looked so delectable, but she had already eaten so much food. Still, it wasn't like she was going to get to eat here every day.

Her dad had a large limit on his credit card, but it wasn't infinite. Though, it wasn't like she was without her own income. She did have a job after all. Still, it was a tough decision to go for the desserts.
113131.title: The good tasting but filling Italian food

choices: Head to the park and take a nice nap
Resist the urge to nap and go grocery shopping
1131311.content:
Kat couldn't resist, she heaved herself to her feet and made her way towards the dessert table. She grabbed a plate and began loading it up with all the baked goods she could fit on it before making her way back to her table. She was ravenous as she devoured the treats before heading back for more.

She was so full, yet she couldn't help herself. She needed to eat. She needed them. She hadn't been able to eat like this in a long time. Years even.

She had been a child, maybe 8 or 9, at the time. Her parents had kept a lot more food in the house at that time. However, she couldn't resist the call of the food, and had started waiting for her parents to go to bed and would sneak downstairs and binge on all the delicious goodies. Of course it hadn't taken long for her parents to catch on to what was happening when the cupboards seemed to magically empty every night, and their daughter was starting to get a chubby belly.

Eventually, they had just stopped restocking the snacks, forcing her to give up her desires. Still, it had taken a while to undo the damage to her waistline. Especially since she wasn't a particularly active individual. Of course, she blamed that on being a nekomimi. However, to this day she still found it almost impossible for her to resist overeating when given the chance. She really didn't care if it made her gain weight, she just loved eating too much.

Finally, she leaned back in her chair rubbing her sorely stretched belly as she winced at how tight her clothes felt. Lucinda seemed to be fighting off a food coma across the table, as she seemed to be staring off into space.

"We should probably head out." Kat said, heaving herself lazily to her feet.

"Ugh, I'm sooo full. I think I'm going to explode if I take another bite." Lucinda said, grabbing another dressing soaked leaf of lettuce and sticking it into her mouth.

"Come on, before we get stuck here." Kat chuckled, helping her friend to her feet.

The two of them made their way outside into the warm evening air, which threatened to lull them into a deep sleep. They weren't far from the city park, and the evening was so nice that Kat was considering taking a short nap. It seemed like Lucinda was on the verge of napping regardless, and it might help to digest all the food they'd eaten, but she was sure she'd be hungry again when she woke up, and that might make it harder to resist buying more at the grocery store.
1131311.title: Live a little and stuff herself with desserts

1132.content:
Well, since people are complaining that there are not as many paths for the other groups, I'll just get started on them.
Since this is the fast-paced weight gain,

Path 1 - Magic-based
In this arc, Katherine receives a phone call from her old friend Lucinda, a young rabbit-girl(once again, still just ears and the tail), who has come back from a boarding school in England, little does Katherine know that her friend is now a 100% certified witch.
Standard magic-based mayhem is unleashed.

Path 2 - Chemical based
Katherine notices a new dietary supplement advertisement on the television, and decides that since no one really exercises during the winter, she would burn off the excess pounds from thanksgiving with the help of it.
Little does she know that the pill was rejected from commercial sales due to it's effects on the human/kimonomimi body, which are as follows.
~ Causes the body's digestive system to kick into overdrive and process everything in the body, leaving little to no fecal waste.
~ Causes the body's metabolism slow down to a crawl, and causes the body to be sluggish and lethargic.
~ Messes with the mind's satiety reflex, causing a seemingly endless hunger, even when stuffed until the one who ingested it can't even see straight, the hunger wouldn't stop.
~ Causes the muscles in the legs to atrophy a little, making the conscious effort to exercise with cardiovascular exercise difficult.
~ and causes the internal organs(Heart, lungs, and other such vital organs) to grow to accomidate the rest of the body.

Or you could always make your own path in the third option.
1132.title: Fast paced

11323.content:
-Burgertopia
In this path, a new fast food restaurant called Burgertopia opens in Katherine's town. Katherine, being a food junkie, is the first (and only) customer in line after hearing that their burgers are the greatest tasting burgers in the world. What they don't tell you are all the side effects the chemicals in the burgers have (aside from making it taste amazing)
- Slows metabolism
- Multiplies fat cells
- Makes you crave more (actually intended)
- Makes you content with being fat (also intended)
11323.title: Hyper burger

113231.content:
Katherine eagerly waited outside of the new fast food joint that was about to open, Burgertopia. It was acclaimed to have the best tasting burgers in the world. Katherine, wanting something better than her day-to-day meals, was so excited that she was nearly hopping up and down with excitement. However, she had taken notice that she was the only one waiting, which was strange, since this place was world renowned. Her thoughts were cut off from the sound of a door unlocking, as the front door of Burgertopia opened, for all to eat. Katherine burst into the restaurant, only to find out that the registers were all automated. This didn't bother her too much, so she put her order in, and waited patiently. When her order was done, she was given a note saying that it was a to go meal, since the place just started out. Katherine left the building, got into her car, and drove off to her house. When she reached her house, she unlocked the front door, and entered. When she got out all of the food from it's bags, she pondered what to eat first. She eventually decided on a small burger, but she was soon shoveling it all into her mouth, as a sudden hunger pang came over her. When all that was left were empty wrappers, Katherine sit back, and rubbed her now rotund stomach. When she saw this, she immediately made a dash to the scale. She stepped on, and watched as the digits began scrambling (it was a digital one), until they eventually stopped on 459 lbs. Katherine, mind filled with shock, reached up slowly with both hands, and squeezed her abdomen. Upon feeling how soft it was, her tail immediately perked up, and she said "My god! I've never looked better in my life!" This was a side effect of the food at Burgertopia. The company inserts all kinds of different chemicals into the food to help attract customers and keep them. The intended effects we're to
1. Make the food taste good
2. Make the consumer want more
3. Make the consumer content with being fat (this was implemented in case there was a boycott on the company for the sever weight gain that was bound to happen, like what happened to McDonald's a while back)
However, there was a miscommunication about the third effect, and the R&D department of the company thought they were to make the food extremely fattening. The reason nobody but Katherine showed up to the grand opening was due to multiple reports of massive weight gain, like a journalist who gained over 800 pounds while researching the restaurant, AND HE DIDN'T EVEN CARE! However, this news did not reach Katherine, and now she is under the spell of Burgertopia. She wanted more, but she was feeling very lazy. Luckily, they had made a mobile app to order food directly to your door. She also considered her wardrobe, as if she had gotten fatter, she may have outgrown some clothes.

What will she do now?
113231.title: The Burger Trip

choices: Meeting her cyber-boyfriend might be fun(slow)
1133.content:
Choice 1 -=- Meeting her cyber-boyfriend.
While her parents are away on their cruise, Katherine sees it as the perfect time to finally meet up with her cyber-boyfriend, Katakana19.
Little does she know that he's an aspiring chef, and a tad kinky.
(Includes forced or regular feeding, bondage, and cosplay[Costume play for those of you who don't know])

Choice 2 -=- Alien encounter, gone wrong
A bunch of alien scientists abduct her and another women, and do experiments on how the earthling bodies metabolises their native food. After which, they experiment with the new(to them at least) found substance fat and figure out how to manipulate it.
(Includes feeding tubes, aliens, strange alien devices, figure changing, and slight bondage[straped to a table])

Choice 3 -=- More
Need I say anything here?
1133.title: Other story lines

choices: A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down...
11331.content:
"5274 Timber Lane..." Katherine muttered, as she looked at a mailbox on the side of the road "This must be Katakana's place" she stated, putting the piece of paper into her pocket "I can't believe that I'm finally going to meet this guy after three years, I wonder why he never told me where he lived, seeing how it was just a town over" she said, walking up to the door, and proceeded to knock at it.
"Coming!" echoed a voice as she heard footsteps pounding towards her, the door opened suddenly as she saw the body of her cyber-boyfriend. He was a mouse-boy, roughly nineteen years of age, and 5' 10". "Aphrokitty, I presume?"
"Yeah, and your Katakana19 right?"
"That's right" he said, a smile on his face "Uh... Would you like to come in for some tea?" he asked, stepping to the side of the door, and motioning inside his house.
"That would be lovely" she said, following him inside.

She had just sat down at the kitchen table before it dawned on her. "I'm sorry, but I forgot to introduce myself, my name's Katherine"
"That's a lovely name, mine is Arthur" he said, placing a small plate of cookies on the table "feel free to have some while we wait for the tea kettle"
"Oh, thank you" she said, picking one up and breaking off a bit in her mouth "Wow, this is delicious!" Katherine exclaimed, as the delicate flavors of chocolate and vanilla danced across her pallet.
"Thanks, it's my own recipe, I call it Ying-Yang-Yum" he chuckled, pointing out how his cookies were made up of dark and light cookie dough formed into the shape of a Yin-yan symbol with a dark chocolate chip and a white-chocolate chip in place of the dots.
"They're just so good..." she cooed, before finishing off the rest of the one in her hand, before she mentally stopped herself from instinctually reaching out for another one 'I better stop there, if I have another one it'll just lead to even more, and before I know it, I'll look like a total pig in front of Arthur...'.
"That's what everyone says, normally they can't help but have at least three, I've never eaten them since I don't have much of a sweet tooth" he said, walking over to his stove, as the kettle whistled "I have Rose Red, Earl Grey, and some green tea, what's your pleasure?" he asked, pulling two tea cups from the cupboard.
"I'll have some Rose Red, with two spoonfuls of sug..." she started, before her mind interrupted her again 'I better not have too many sweets, or I won't be able to stop myself, I don't want another incident like that time when I worked at the chocolate store, it took me weeks to work off all of that weight'.

------------------------------
Right, time for the two choices for this chapter.
Choice 1 - Arthur picks up on the first few letters of what she was going to say, and adds it to her tea, setting her sweet tooth off, resulting in a breakdown of will power.

Choice 2 - She tries to presevere, and resists her sweet tooth.

1211.content:
"I hate shots! I hate them!" Katherine groaned. It was that time of year again; flu season. And everyone knows that flu season brings in flu shots along with it. Not that Katherine was scared of getting the flu if it meant avoiding the ever so dreadful shots.

"Now, now, this is just a simple immunization shot. Nothing to be afraid of." the doctor reasured her while sterilizing a spot on her arm. "Now, you're going to feel a little prick."

"OW!"

"There, all done." the doctor explained, rubbing more alcohol on her arm and applying a bandage. "Just keep that on until tomorrow."

"Yeah, thanks." Katherine muttered as she left the room and the subsequent hospital complex. Unfortunately for her, the doctor was a little nearsighted and accidently gave her an experimental hormone therapy medicine that was only meant for older women. At her age, it could cause large amounts of breast growth and heavy milk production.

When Katherine arrived home, she found the house empty and a note from her mother.

"Katherine,
We've left for our second honeymoon and we won't be back until next month. There's plenty of food in the fridge and pantry and your father left his debit card to use for the rest of the month. Just be sure to behave yourself and water the plants each night.
Love,
Mom"

"Oh, that's right. They were leaving today." Katherine sighed. With her parents gone, there wasn't much to do except finish her studies, get something to eat, and go to bed. As she slept, the hormone therapy started to take effect and in the morning, she found...
1211.title: Malpratice

choices: Katherine quite likes her new enhancements, especially the taste of her own milk
12113.content:
Katherine was having one of those weird dreams. It started out fairly normally. She was on a big, comfy bed, surrounded by pillows of all shapes and sizes. In front of her was a pail of milk, which she was drinking from quite happily. Just like all cats, milk was one of, if not her favorite things to drink.

As she neared the bottom of the bucket, the milk began to taste a little different. Not bad, just different. Katherine thought it even tasted a little better than normal. Finishing the pail, Katherine laid down on a few of the pillows and patted her belly, giving a little purr as she rubbed it. She though it looked cute, sticking out a little where the milk filled her belly.

Suddenly, she felt a slight pressure in her chest. Not minding too much, the cat girl just rubbed her belly, content after the imaginary meal. But the pressure grew stronger. Suddenly, before her very eyes, her breasts started to grow. Quickly her previous b-cup breasts filled out, puffing up and getting bigger. Soon they looked to be at least a D-cup, and their rate of expansion was increasing. Passing G-cup, Katherine began to feel another increase in pressure once again. Another surge in growth and Katherine's small black silk bra blew clean off.

Suddenly Katherine's now J-cup boobs began...leaking? Katherine couldn't believe her eyes, but sure enough her breasts were leaking a white liquid that she could only suppose was milk. She let out a gasp as another surge in pressre hit her. This one however, was coupled with one od the strongest orgasms she had either felt. Writhing in pleasure, Katherine's breasts seemed to respond to their owners excitement. What was previously a small dribble of milk quickly became a stream and soon a jet of milk. Her now M-cup breasts were still growing, and the larger they got the more milk they produced.



With a yawn, Katherine woke from her dreamy slumber. Most of the dream was lost in her still clouded head, but bits and pieces made it through to her memory. Something about big breasts...and milk. Lots and lots of milk....darn, it was just out of reach.

Clearing the last cobwebs from her mind, Katherine was suprised by a weight on her chest. Odd, considering she usually slept naked (it's a cat thing). Pushing her blankets away, she found out just what that weight was. It was her breasts. They looked to be a little over a D-cup, much larger than her previous B. And there was a small trickle of a white substance dripping from both of her nipples. Brushing some of it up with a finger, she shivered with delight, as her apparently much more sensitive rack sent a wave of heat through her. Licking the it off her finger, the cat girl was suprised to findit was...milk? She was lactating?

Continue
Katherine's problem.
This was a typical day for the cat girl named Katherine. Not much was happening this day except going to the doctor for a check-up. Katherine wasn't too thrilled but she knew it had to be done.
Without much question, she decided to put on a plain blue shirt and a tan skirt to match followed by some black shoes. Her day was rather boring because she did nothing with it. She just relaxed and watched television.
She wasn't a lazy cat, despite doing nothing productive this day. She just had a day off from work and decided to use the day for nothing more than an exciting television show and some of her baked goods.
She ate them throughout the day and managed to finish them. Now time hit her and after she got dressed, she headed out to the doctors office. When she got there, she had to wait.
Minutes felt like hours as she sat in the waiting room but she was finally serviced. She entered the doctors room and got checked out like normal. Everything was normal, but when she was checking out she couldn't help but notice a medical syringe in a red box.
Out of curiosity, she decided to walk towards it. There was a sign next to it that read "Experimentation needed. For doctors only." She didn't see much else and decided to take it home.
The check-out lady didn't seem to suspect anything unusual and let her walk out the door with the box. It wasn't long before she had finally made it home for some more lounging.
She sat on the couch and found more instructions on the box. It said, "Expand-a-mams, this experimental drug can be used to enhance a female's reproductive organs and should be used only when in labor. Although the affects the drug are temporary, it should help any lady take care of the child...(THIS PRODUCT IS UNFINISHED AND NEEDS TO BE TESTED BEFORE BEING SOLD)
Feeling unusually adventurous, she decided to test it on herself. Like a "big girl", she stuck the syringe in and thought nothing else of it. She didn't use all of it but just a small sample. It wasn't long before she felt the affects of the drug.
What started as a simple prick evolved into a tingle. This tingle spread across her arm and into her chest area. It lingered in her chest and began to get stronger. The Her chest started getting warm and she felt some sort of liquid fill her up.
Her bust grew slow but surely. Going through the letters she saw it go from small hills to giant balloons. It was heavy too, very heavy. She held it to see if it was really happening.

What happens next?

info.brief_description:
Transformations based around a catgirl.
Not much more that needs to be said.
info.description:
Right, seeing how there are many transformation based stories, most of which have to do with men, or have horrible quality.
So I figured, what the hell, let's see if we can't fix that lil' problem.

This story will be based around a young catgirl(for legal purposes, she's eighteen), named Katherine.
For a basic description on how she looks will be given in an easy to read fashion:

Name: Katherine
Race: Cat-girl(Nekomimi, meaning human with a cat's ears and tail)
Age: 18
Height: 5'6"
Weight: 115 lbs (52.27 Kg)
Hair colour: light brown
Eye colour: Blue
Skin colour: light tan
Personality: Shy, and a little naive.
Weakness: Baked goods and sugar.

EDIT
We now have a few more characters, so I'll list their stuff here

Name: Lucinda
Race: Bunny-girl(human, with bunny ears, and tail)
Age: 17
Height: 5'4"
Weight: 85 lbs (38.63 Kg)
Hair colour: White
Eye colour: Red
Skin colour: Milky white
Personality: Spunky, and intellectual.
